channel.title: Picture Manipulation[req]
channel.description:
So, I have this IT course in my school, and I for sure don't have enough time for all the assigments I am given. So, would anyone be willing to help me with picture manipulation? I know it's a piece of cake but I just don't have the time for it.
So you should have two or more pictures, and mix them together (e.g. take a part of a pic and paste it to the other pic) so that you can't see that the picture is manipulated. You should also link me to the original pictures.
Subject is free, not anything too harsh though because it's a school project :P
Lots of love, +---, and thanks for whoever gives me a hand =).

item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Well, we should do this project in school, not in home so I don’t think this should be moved to Homework Help. Also, I posted it here because I hoped I could grab better the attention of real photoshoppers

Also, I added you on MSN Mr.Chris. Thanks =)

Read full topic
